2 BED + Dining Room + 2 BATH
Prime TORRANCE Location
Exceptionally Well Maintained Property
Controlled Access Community
Friendly On-Site Managers
Beautiful Pool
Reserved / Gated Parking Included
New Kitchen w/Sleek Granite Counters
Washer & Dryer Hook-Ups Inside This Unit
+ Community Laundry Room On-Site

PROPERTY ID CODE: PL4803
Please refer to this code when contacting us about this apartment.

*SECTION 8 is NOT ACCEPTED*
No Dogs
1 Indoor Cat Will be Considered

Great Floor-Plan
Dining Room Next to Kitchen
Private Balcony Next to the Dining Room
Private Laundry Area this Unit
Soft Carpet Flooring in Bedrooms & Common Areas
Dishwasher
Spacious Upper Unit
Tile Floors in Kitchen, Bathrooms, & Dining Room
Controlled Access Property
Big Windows / Great Light

Prime TORRANCE location.
Easy access to major freeways, Hawthorne, South-Bay, Redondo Beach, Manhattan Beach, LAX, Lawndale, etc.

TO VIEW:
Fill out the “REQUEST A VIEWING” box & hit “SEND” for an immediate E-MAIL response.
*Please enter in all of your information accurately.

rental-terms.application-fee-description: The application fee can be paid online via PayPal using your Credit or Debit card.
